title: Eric Dane Reveals His Right Arm No Longer Works Amid ALS Battle

description: Rumani, who joined BBC Studios in 2006, has passed away after a long battle with cancer.

title: K-pop Star Bain is Ready to Open a New Chapter Following Historic Coming Out: “I Can Finally Be Free”

title: Music Publishers and X Could Settle Lawsuit, Ask Judge to Stay Proceedings

description: The protests in Los Angeles have seen several episodes in which journalists have been struck by rounds from LAPD.

title: ‘Project Runway’ Contestant Killed by Gunfire During “No Kings” March in Salt Lake City

title: Outside the Diddy Trial, a New Media Guard Rules

title: Sabrina Carpenter Lands Second Number One Single With “Manchild”
description: "Manchild" marks Carpenter's second time topping Billboard's Hot 100 in the past 12 months, following "Please Please Please" last year.
